processId.description: The ID of the process to kill.

path.description: The location of the file that starts the process on the endpoint where it is stored.

endpointId.description: The endpoint (or node) where the process is running

incidentId.description: [Optional] The ID of the incident generated as a result of this process.

result.description: If the task was successful, contains the ID for the task created as a result of the request.
